document.query: INSERT INTO message_code(code, title, content,description, module) VALUES ('10016', 'GoTasty Sale Order Telegram Notification', ' %%userAction%% Phone Number : %%phoneNum%% Sales Order Name: %%soName%%', 'Trigger when create new sales order','Standard Platform’);
